@gov.au/page-alerts
============

> Use page alerts to notify users of important information and state changes to the page.


## Contents

* [Install](#install)
* [Build](#build)
* [Tests](#tests)
* [Release History](#release-history)
* [License](#license)


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


## Install


```shell
npm install @gov.au/page-alerts --save-dev
```
